channel.title: Posts on Joshua Pughe-Sanford

item.title: My First Post
item.description: I finally got GitHub working as a host for the site! Starting this Friday, I’m going to start posting weekly research updates, to both track my progress and work on my techinical writing skills.
item.content: I finally got GitHub working as a host for the site! Starting this Friday, I’m going to start posting weekly research updates, to both track my progress and work on my techinical writing skills.
